programme.desc: From hotels to orbiting "reefs," the foundations for a burgeoning off-world economy are well underway. Duration: 3600

programme.desc: Space Tourist takes us out of this world to a company making plans to build a hotel in space as well as those closer to home. Duration: 1783

programme.desc: Our team Ewoks the line with a deep space dive to a social galaxy, far far away Duration: 1817

programme.title: Best of Cinespace
programme.desc: Space Channel selects the our favorite Cinespace movies Duration: 7200

programme.title: Social Space
programme.desc: Our Darth comedy episode where we finally found out why Yoda is such a good gardener. Jedi fruits grow best with a green thumb! Duration: 1800

programme.title: Cinespace Short Films
programme.desc: A short film competition that offers filmmakers, editors, and animators around the world a chance to share their works inspired by, and using actual NASA imagery. Duration: 1800

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: There are just some space movie trailers that are superior, satisfying and SICK!!!!! Here's a few of our favorites Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : Money Trouble
programme.desc: In the world of space dealing everyone is having money trouble. Larry gets the offer of a lifetime: a Soviet era space suit. But there’s a problem – the price tag. To be in with a chance he has to clear stock and raise some dough. Torie pays big for an Apollo 11 artefact but it’s not what it seems – has she thrown away $10,000? And Cole meets Apollo 7 legend Walt Cunningham who shares memories of his time in space. Cole has money to spend – what he wants to know is will Walt part with any of his space items? Duration: 3600
